practice_phrases.target: I want to but I am not sure
but I am trying to learn
I wanted to speak but I was tired

practice_phrases.known: 我想帮助你但是我还没准备好
practice_phrases.target: I want to help you but I am not ready

practice_phrases.known: 我想回来但是我太累了
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to come back but I was too tired

practice_phrases.known: 我想和你说话但是我还没准备好
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak with you but I was not ready

practice_phrases.known: 我努力学习但是我不确定我能说得很好
practice_phrases.target: I am trying to learn but I am not sure if I can speak very well

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上想向你解释一些事但是我有点累
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to explain something to you this morning but I was a little tired
